'''Sabormi''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

## Background

{{Description|A young woman with a bright, wide smile and eyes to match raises her hand and gives you a quick but enthusiastic wave.

Then, with an exaggerated look of embarrassment, she stops herself and crosses her forearms over her chest.}}
Sabormi is the quartermaster for the Imperial Command and a loyal Rauataian patriot, but that doesn't mean she isn't excited about the prospect of seeing something outside of the mudslides and storms that define her homeland. Her excitability leads to plenty of confrontation with the hazanui, but it seems the two women actually like each other - and Sabormi, for all the ledgers she lost, is a competent quartermaster.

## Interactions

{{Interactions
|companion       =
|wares           = High end weapons and armor. Requires at least Good 2 reputation with RDC.
She doesn't sell unique weapons, but plenty of exceptional gear and various non-unique accessories, like the [Blunting Belt](/bluntingBelt/), [Boots of Stone](/bootsOfStone/), [Gauntlets of Discipline](/gauntletsOfDiscipline/), or the [Girdle of Mortal Protection](/girdleOfMortalProtection/).
|stronghold      =
|rest            =
|quests_started  =
|quests_involved =
|none            = 
|other           =
}}
